scenes.label: *start
texts: Just as the hackers predicted, Flight 302 ran out of fuel.
I tried all kinds of stuff, but it was all in vain.
No one could do anything to prevent it. Not the top quest participants, not even the hacker who outpaced the police.
As people all over the world watched in terror, and countless hackers gave it their all...
...Flight 302, with more than 200 passengers onboard, fell from the sky and crashed in Odaiba.
